AllocateStaticIp.name: AllocateStaticIp
AllocateStaticIp.description: Grants permission to create a static IP address that can be attached to an instance

AttachCertificateToDistribution.name: AttachCertificateToDistribution
AttachCertificateToDistribution.description: Grants permission to attach an SSL/TLS certificate to your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

AttachDisk.name: AttachDisk
AttachDisk.description: Grants permission to attach a disk to an instance

AttachInstancesToLoadBalancer.name: AttachInstancesToLoadBalancer
AttachInstancesToLoadBalancer.description: Grants permission to attach one or more instances to a load balancer

AttachLoadBalancerTlsCertificate.name: AttachLoadBalancerTlsCertificate
AttachLoadBalancerTlsCertificate.description: Grants permission to attach a TLS certificate to a load balancer

AttachStaticIp.name: AttachStaticIp
AttachStaticIp.description: Grants permission to attach a static IP address to an instance

CloseInstancePublicPorts.name: CloseInstancePublicPorts
CloseInstancePublicPorts.description: Grants permission to close a public port of an instance

CopySnapshot.name: CopySnapshot
CopySnapshot.description: Grants permission to copy a snapshot from one AWS Region to another in Amazon Lightsail

CreateBucket.name: CreateBucket
CreateBucket.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Lightsail bucket

CreateBucketAccessKey.name: CreateBucketAccessKey
CreateBucketAccessKey.description: Grants permission to create a new access key for the specified bucket

CreateCertificate.name: CreateCertificate
CreateCertificate.description: Grants permission to create an SSL/TLS certificate

CreateCloudFormationStack.name: CreateCloudFormationStack
CreateCloudFormationStack.description: Grants permission to create a new Amazon EC2 instance from an exported Amazon Lightsail snapshot

CreateContactMethod.name: CreateContactMethod
CreateContactMethod.description: Grants permission to create an email or SMS text message contact method

CreateContainerService.name: CreateContainerService
CreateContainerService.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Lightsail container service

CreateContainerServiceDeployment.name: CreateContainerServiceDeployment
CreateContainerServiceDeployment.description: Grants permission to create a deployment for your Amazon Lightsail container service

CreateContainerServiceRegistryLogin.name: CreateContainerServiceRegistryLogin
CreateContainerServiceRegistryLogin.description: Grants permission to create a temporary set of log in credentials that you can use to log in to the Docker process on your local machine

CreateDisk.name: CreateDisk
CreateDisk.description: Grants permission to create a disk

CreateDiskFromSnapshot.name: CreateDiskFromSnapshot
CreateDiskFromSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a disk from snapshot

CreateDiskSnapshot.name: CreateDiskSnapshot
CreateDiskSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a disk snapshot

CreateDistribution.name: CreateDistribution
CreateDistribution.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

CreateDomain.name: CreateDomain
CreateDomain.description: Grants permission to create a domain resource for the specified domain name

CreateDomainEntry.name: CreateDomainEntry
CreateDomainEntry.description: Grants permission to create one or more DNS record entries for a domain resource: Address (A), canonical name (CNAME), mail exchanger (MX), name server (NS), start of authority (SOA), service locator (SRV), or text (TXT)

CreateGUISessionAccessDetails.name: CreateGUISessionAccessDetails
CreateGUISessionAccessDetails.description: Grants permission to create URLs that are used to access an instance's graphical user interface (GUI) session

CreateInstanceSnapshot.name: CreateInstanceSnapshot
CreateInstanceSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create an instance snapshot

CreateInstances.name: CreateInstances
CreateInstances.description: Grants permission to create one or more instances

CreateInstancesFromSnapshot.name: CreateInstancesFromSnapshot
CreateInstancesFromSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create one or more instances based on an instance snapshot

CreateKeyPair.name: CreateKeyPair
CreateKeyPair.description: Grants permission to create a key pair used to authenticate and connect to an instance

CreateLoadBalancer.name: CreateLoadBalancer
CreateLoadBalancer.description: Grants permission to create a load balancer

CreateLoadBalancerTlsCertificate.name: CreateLoadBalancerTlsCertificate
CreateLoadBalancerTlsCertificate.description: Grants permission to create a load balancer TLS certificate

CreateRelationalDatabase.name: CreateRelationalDatabase
CreateRelationalDatabase.description: Grants permission to create a new relational database

CreateRelationalDatabaseFromSnapshot.name: CreateRelationalDatabaseFromSnapshot
CreateRelationalDatabaseFromSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a new relational database from a snapshot

CreateRelationalDatabaseSnapshot.name: CreateRelationalDatabaseSnapshot
CreateRelationalDatabaseSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a relational database snapshot

DeleteAlarm.name: DeleteAlarm
DeleteAlarm.description: Grants permission to delete an alarm

DeleteAutoSnapshot.name: DeleteAutoSnapshot
DeleteAutoSnapshot.description: Grants permission to delete an automatic snapshot of an instance or disk

DeleteBucket.name: DeleteBucket
DeleteBucket.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Lightsail bucket

DeleteBucketAccessKey.name: DeleteBucketAccessKey
DeleteBucketAccessKey.description: Grants permission to delete an access key for the specified Amazon Lightsail bucket

DeleteCertificate.name: DeleteCertificate
DeleteCertificate.description: Grants permission to delete an SSL/TLS certificate

DeleteContactMethod.name: DeleteContactMethod
DeleteContactMethod.description: Grants permission to delete a contact method

DeleteContainerImage.name: DeleteContainerImage
DeleteContainerImage.description: Grants permission to delete a container image that is registered to your Amazon Lightsail container service

DeleteContainerService.name: DeleteContainerService
DeleteContainerService.description: Grants permission to delete your Amazon Lightsail container service

DeleteDisk.name: DeleteDisk
DeleteDisk.description: Grants permission to delete a disk

DeleteDiskSnapshot.name: DeleteDiskSnapshot
DeleteDiskSnapshot.description: Grants permission to delete a disk snapshot

DeleteDistribution.name: DeleteDistribution
DeleteDistribution.description: Grants permission to delete your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

DeleteDomain.name: DeleteDomain
DeleteDomain.description: Grants permission to delete a domain resource and all of its DNS records

DeleteDomainEntry.name: DeleteDomainEntry
DeleteDomainEntry.description: Grants permission to delete a DNS record entry for a domain resource

DeleteInstance.name: DeleteInstance
DeleteInstance.description: Grants permission to delete an instance

DeleteInstanceSnapshot.name: DeleteInstanceSnapshot
DeleteInstanceSnapshot.description: Grants permission to delete an instance snapshot

DeleteKeyPair.name: DeleteKeyPair
DeleteKeyPair.description: Grants permission to delete a key pair used to authenticate and connect to an instance

DeleteKnownHostKeys.name: DeleteKnownHostKeys
DeleteKnownHostKeys.description: Grants permission to delete the known host key or certificate used by the Amazon Lightsail browser-based SSH or RDP clients to authenticate an instance

DeleteLoadBalancer.name: DeleteLoadBalancer
DeleteLoadBalancer.description: Grants permission to delete a load balancer

DeleteLoadBalancerTlsCertificate.name: DeleteLoadBalancerTlsCertificate
DeleteLoadBalancerTlsCertificate.description: Grants permission to delete a load balancer TLS certificate

DeleteRelationalDatabase.name: DeleteRelationalDatabase
DeleteRelationalDatabase.description: Grants permission to delete a relational database

DeleteRelationalDatabaseSnapshot.name: DeleteRelationalDatabaseSnapshot
DeleteRelationalDatabaseSnapshot.description: Grants permission to delete a relational database snapshot

DetachCertificateFromDistribution.name: DetachCertificateFromDistribution
DetachCertificateFromDistribution.description: Grants permission to detach an SSL/TLS certificate from your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

DetachDisk.name: DetachDisk
DetachDisk.description: Grants permission to detach a disk from an instance

DetachInstancesFromLoadBalancer.name: DetachInstancesFromLoadBalancer
DetachInstancesFromLoadBalancer.description: Grants permission to detach one or more instances from a load balancer

DetachStaticIp.name: DetachStaticIp
DetachStaticIp.description: Grants permission to detach a static IP from an instance to which it is attached

DisableAddOn.name: DisableAddOn
DisableAddOn.description: Grants permission to disable an add-on for an Amazon Lightsail resource

DownloadDefaultKeyPair.name: DownloadDefaultKeyPair
DownloadDefaultKeyPair.description: Grants permission to download the default key pair used to authenticate and connect to instances in a specific AWS Region

EnableAddOn.name: EnableAddOn
EnableAddOn.description: Grants permission to enable or modify an add-on for an Amazon Lightsail resource

ExportSnapshot.name: ExportSnapshot
ExportSnapshot.description: Grants permission to export an Amazon Lightsail snapshot to Amazon EC2

GetActiveNames.name: GetActiveNames
GetActiveNames.description: Grants permission to get the names of all active (not deleted) resources

GetAlarms.name: GetAlarms
GetAlarms.description: Grants permission to view information about the configured alarms

GetAutoSnapshots.name: GetAutoSnapshots
GetAutoSnapshots.description: Grants permission to view the available automatic snapshots for an instance or disk

GetBlueprints.name: GetBlueprints
GetBlueprints.description: Grants permission to get a list of instance images, or blueprints. You can use a blueprint to create a new instance already running a specific operating system, as well as a pre-installed application or development stack. The software that runs on your instance depends on the blueprint you define when creating the instance

GetBucketAccessKeys.name: GetBucketAccessKeys
GetBucketAccessKeys.description: Grants permission to get the existing access key IDs for the specified Amazon Lightsail bucket

GetBucketBundles.name: GetBucketBundles
GetBucketBundles.description: Grants permission to get the bundles that can be applied to an Amazon Lightsail bucket

GetBucketMetricData.name: GetBucketMetricData
GetBucketMetricData.description: Grants permission to get the data points of a specific metric for an Amazon Lightsail bucket

GetBuckets.name: GetBuckets
GetBuckets.description: Grants permission to get information about one or more Amazon Lightsail buckets

GetBundles.name: GetBundles
GetBundles.description: Grants permission to get a list of instance bundles. You can use a bundle to create a new instance with a set of performance specifications, such as CPU count, disk size, RAM size, and network transfer allowance. The cost of your instance depends on the bundle you define when creating the instance

GetCertificates.name: GetCertificates
GetCertificates.description: Grants permission to view information about one or more Amazon Lightsail SSL/TLS certificates

GetCloudFormationStackRecords.name: GetCloudFormationStackRecords
GetCloudFormationStackRecords.description: Grants permission to get information about all CloudFormation stacks used to create Amazon EC2 resources from exported Amazon Lightsail snapshots

GetContactMethods.name: GetContactMethods
GetContactMethods.description: Grants permission to view information about the configured contact methods

GetContainerAPIMetadata.name: GetContainerAPIMetadata
GetContainerAPIMetadata.description: Grants permission to view information about Amazon Lightsail containers, such as the current version of the Lightsail Control (lightsailctl) plugin

GetContainerImages.name: GetContainerImages
GetContainerImages.description: Grants permission to view the container images that are registered to your Amazon Lightsail container service

GetContainerLog.name: GetContainerLog
GetContainerLog.description: Grants permission to view the log events of a container of your Amazon Lightsail container service

GetContainerServiceDeployments.name: GetContainerServiceDeployments
GetContainerServiceDeployments.description: Grants permission to view the deployments for your Amazon Lightsail container service

GetContainerServiceMetricData.name: GetContainerServiceMetricData
GetContainerServiceMetricData.description: Grants permission to view the data points of a specific metric of your Amazon Lightsail container service

GetContainerServicePowers.name: GetContainerServicePowers
GetContainerServicePowers.description: Grants permission to view the list of powers that can be specified for your Amazon Lightsail container services

GetContainerServices.name: GetContainerServices
GetContainerServices.description: Grants permission to view information about one or more of your Amazon Lightsail container services

GetCostEstimate.name: GetCostEstimate
GetCostEstimate.description: Grants permission to get the information about the cost estimate for a specified resource

GetDisk.name: GetDisk
GetDisk.description: Grants permission to get information about a disk

GetDiskSnapshot.name: GetDiskSnapshot
GetDiskSnapshot.description: Grants permission to get information about a disk snapshot

GetDiskSnapshots.name: GetDiskSnapshots
GetDiskSnapshots.description: Grants permission to get information about all disk snapshots

GetDisks.name: GetDisks
GetDisks.description: Grants permission to get information about all disks

GetDistributionBundles.name: GetDistributionBundles
GetDistributionBundles.description: Grants permission to view the list of bundles that can be applied to you Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distributions

GetDistributionLatestCacheReset.name: GetDistributionLatestCacheReset
GetDistributionLatestCacheReset.description: Grants permission to view the timestamp and status of the last cache reset of a specific Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

GetDistributionMetricData.name: GetDistributionMetricData
GetDistributionMetricData.description: Grants permission to view the data points of a specific metric for an Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

GetDistributions.name: GetDistributions
GetDistributions.description: Grants permission to view information about one or more of your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distributions

GetDomain.name: GetDomain
GetDomain.description: Grants permission to get DNS records for a domain resource

GetDomains.name: GetDomains
GetDomains.description: Grants permission to get DNS records for all domain resources

GetExportSnapshotRecords.name: GetExportSnapshotRecords
GetExportSnapshotRecords.description: Grants permission to get information about all records of exported Amazon Lightsail snapshots to Amazon EC2

GetInstance.name: GetInstance
GetInstance.description: Grants permission to get information about an instance

GetInstanceAccessDetails.name: GetInstanceAccessDetails
GetInstanceAccessDetails.description: Grants permission to get temporary keys you can use to authenticate and connect to an instance

GetInstanceMetricData.name: GetInstanceMetricData
GetInstanceMetricData.description: Grants permission to get the data points for the specified metric of an instance

GetInstancePortStates.name: GetInstancePortStates
GetInstancePortStates.description: Grants permission to get the port states of an instance

GetInstanceSnapshot.name: GetInstanceSnapshot
GetInstanceSnapshot.description: Grants permission to get information about an instance snapshot

GetInstanceSnapshots.name: GetInstanceSnapshots
GetInstanceSnapshots.description: Grants permission to get information about all instance snapshots

GetInstanceState.name: GetInstanceState
GetInstanceState.description: Grants permission to get the state of an instance

GetInstances.name: GetInstances
GetInstances.description: Grants permission to get information about all instances

GetKeyPair.name: GetKeyPair
GetKeyPair.description: Grants permission to get information about a key pair

GetKeyPairs.name: GetKeyPairs
GetKeyPairs.description: Grants permission to get information about all key pairs

GetLoadBalancer.name: GetLoadBalancer
GetLoadBalancer.description: Grants permission to get information about a load balancer

GetLoadBalancerMetricData.name: GetLoadBalancerMetricData
GetLoadBalancerMetricData.description: Grants permission to get the data points for the specified metric of a load balancer

GetLoadBalancerTlsCertificates.name: GetLoadBalancerTlsCertificates
GetLoadBalancerTlsCertificates.description: Grants permission to get information about a load balancer's TLS certificates

GetLoadBalancerTlsPolicies.name: GetLoadBalancerTlsPolicies
GetLoadBalancerTlsPolicies.description: Grants permission to get a list of TLS security policies that you can apply to Lightsail load balancers

GetLoadBalancers.name: GetLoadBalancers
GetLoadBalancers.description: Grants permission to get information about load balancers

GetOperation.name: GetOperation
GetOperation.description: Grants permission to get information about an operation. Operations include events such as when you create an instance, allocate a static IP, attach a static IP, and so on

GetOperations.name: GetOperations
GetOperations.description: Grants permission to get information about all operations. Operations include events such as when you create an instance, allocate a static IP, attach a static IP, and so on

GetOperationsForResource.name: GetOperationsForResource
GetOperationsForResource.description: Grants permission to get operations for a resource

GetRegions.name: GetRegions
GetRegions.description: Grants permission to get a list of all valid AWS Regions for Amazon Lightsail

GetRelationalDatabase.name: GetRelationalDatabase
GetRelationalDatabase.description: Grants permission to get information about a relational database

GetRelationalDatabaseBlueprints.name: GetRelationalDatabaseBlueprints
GetRelationalDatabaseBlueprints.description: Grants permission to get a list of relational database images, or blueprints. You can use a blueprint to create a new database running a specific database engine. The database engine that runs on your database depends on the blueprint you define when creating the relational database

GetRelationalDatabaseBundles.name: GetRelationalDatabaseBundles
GetRelationalDatabaseBundles.description: Grants permission to get a list of relational database bundles. You can use a bundle to create a new database with a set of performance specifications, such as CPU count, disk size, RAM size, network transfer allowance, and standard of high availability. The cost of your database depends on the bundle you define when creating the relational database

GetRelationalDatabaseEvents.name: GetRelationalDatabaseEvents
GetRelationalDatabaseEvents.description: Grants permission to get events for a relational database

GetRelationalDatabaseLogEvents.name: GetRelationalDatabaseLogEvents
GetRelationalDatabaseLogEvents.description: Grants permission to get events for the specified log stream of a relational database

GetRelationalDatabaseLogStreams.name: GetRelationalDatabaseLogStreams
GetRelationalDatabaseLogStreams.description: Grants permission to get the log streams available for a relational database

GetRelationalDatabaseMasterUserPassword.name: GetRelationalDatabaseMasterUserPassword
GetRelationalDatabaseMasterUserPassword.description: Grants permission to get the master user password of a relational database

GetRelationalDatabaseMetricData.name: GetRelationalDatabaseMetricData
GetRelationalDatabaseMetricData.description: Grants permission to get the data points for the specified metric of a relational database

GetRelationalDatabaseParameters.name: GetRelationalDatabaseParameters
GetRelationalDatabaseParameters.description: Grants permission to get the parameters of a relational database

GetRelationalDatabaseSnapshot.name: GetRelationalDatabaseSnapshot
GetRelationalDatabaseSnapshot.description: Grants permission to get information about a relational database snapshot

GetRelationalDatabaseSnapshots.name: GetRelationalDatabaseSnapshots
GetRelationalDatabaseSnapshots.description: Grants permission to get information about all relational database snapshots

GetRelationalDatabases.name: GetRelationalDatabases
GetRelationalDatabases.description: Grants permission to get information about all relational databases

GetSetupHistory.name: GetSetupHistory
GetSetupHistory.description: Grants permission to get detailed information for setup requests that were run on the specified resource

GetStaticIp.name: GetStaticIp
GetStaticIp.description: Grants permission to get information about a static IP

GetStaticIps.name: GetStaticIps
GetStaticIps.description: Grants permission to get information about all static IPs

ImportKeyPair.name: ImportKeyPair
ImportKeyPair.description: Grants permission to import a public key from a key pair

IsVpcPeered.name: IsVpcPeered
IsVpcPeered.description: Grants permission to get a boolean value indicating whether the Amazon Lightsail virtual private cloud (VPC) is peered

OpenInstancePublicPorts.name: OpenInstancePublicPorts
OpenInstancePublicPorts.description: Grants permission to add, or open a public port of an instance

PeerVpc.name: PeerVpc
PeerVpc.description: Grants permission to try to peer the Amazon Lightsail virtual private cloud (VPC) with the default VPC

PutAlarm.name: PutAlarm
PutAlarm.description: Grants permission to creates or update an alarm, and associate it with the specified metric

PutInstancePublicPorts.name: PutInstancePublicPorts
PutInstancePublicPorts.description: Grants permission to set the specified open ports for an instance, and closes all ports for every protocol not included in the request

RebootInstance.name: RebootInstance
RebootInstance.description: Grants permission to reboot an instance that is in a running state

RebootRelationalDatabase.name: RebootRelationalDatabase
RebootRelationalDatabase.description: Grants permission to reboot a relational database that is in a running state

RegisterContainerImage.name: RegisterContainerImage
RegisterContainerImage.description: Grants permission to register a container image to your Amazon Lightsail container service

ReleaseStaticIp.name: ReleaseStaticIp
ReleaseStaticIp.description: Grants permission to delete a static IP

ResetDistributionCache.name: ResetDistributionCache
ResetDistributionCache.description: Grants permission to delete currently cached content from your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

SendContactMethodVerification.name: SendContactMethodVerification
SendContactMethodVerification.description: Grants permission to send a verification request to an email contact method to ensure it's owned by the requester

SetIpAddressType.name: SetIpAddressType
SetIpAddressType.description: Grants permission to set the IP address type for a Amazon Lightsail resource

SetResourceAccessForBucket.name: SetResourceAccessForBucket
SetResourceAccessForBucket.description: Grants permission to set the Amazon Lightsail resources that can access the specified Amazon Lightsail bucket

SetupInstanceHttps.name: SetupInstanceHttps
SetupInstanceHttps.description: Grants permission to create an SSL/TLS certificate and install it on a specified instance

StartGUISession.name: StartGUISession
StartGUISession.description: Grants permission to initiate a graphical user interface (GUI) session used to access an instance's operating system or application

StartInstance.name: StartInstance
StartInstance.description: Grants permission to start an instance that is in a stopped state

StartRelationalDatabase.name: StartRelationalDatabase
StartRelationalDatabase.description: Grants permission to start a relational database that is in a stopped state

StopGUISession.name: StopGUISession
StopGUISession.description: Grants permission to terminate a graphical user interface (GUI) session used to access an instance's operating system or application

StopInstance.name: StopInstance
StopInstance.description: Grants permission to stop an instance that is in a running state

StopRelationalDatabase.name: StopRelationalDatabase
StopRelationalDatabase.description: Grants permission to stop a relational database that is in a running state

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

TestAlarm.name: TestAlarm
TestAlarm.description: Grants permission to test an alarm by displaying a banner on the Amazon Lightsail console or if a notification trigger is configured for the specified alarm, by sending a notification to the notification protocol

UnpeerVpc.name: UnpeerVpc
UnpeerVpc.description: Grants permission to try to unpeer the Amazon Lightsail virtual private cloud (VPC) from the default VPC

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a resource

UpdateBucket.name: UpdateBucket
UpdateBucket.description: Grants permission to update an existing Amazon Lightsail bucket

UpdateBucketBundle.name: UpdateBucketBundle
UpdateBucketBundle.description: Grants permission to update the bundle, or storage plan, of an existing Amazon Lightsail bucket

UpdateContainerService.name: UpdateContainerService
UpdateContainerService.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of your Amazon Lightsail container service, such as its power, scale, and public domain names

UpdateDistribution.name: UpdateDistribution
UpdateDistribution.description: Grants permission to update an existing Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution or its configuration

UpdateDistributionBundle.name: UpdateDistributionBundle
UpdateDistributionBundle.description: Grants permission to update the bundle of your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

UpdateDomainEntry.name: UpdateDomainEntry
UpdateDomainEntry.description: Grants permission to update a domain recordset after it is created

UpdateInstanceMetadataOptions.name: UpdateInstanceMetadataOptions
UpdateInstanceMetadataOptions.description: Grants permission to update metadata options for an instance

UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute.name: UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute
UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute.description: Grants permission to update a load balancer attribute, such as the health check path and session stickiness

UpdateRelationalDatabase.name: UpdateRelationalDatabase
UpdateRelationalDatabase.description: Grants permission to update a relational database

UpdateRelationalDatabaseParameters.name: UpdateRelationalDatabaseParameters
UpdateRelationalDatabaseParameters.description: Grants permission to update the parameters of a relational database
